title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 55-3.4 - Method of payment of approval fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 55-3.4 - Method of payment of approval fee

State Regulations

Payment for the approval fee must be made 30 days after billing, except that a laboratory may elect to make four equal payments with the first payment due 30 days after billing (the "first payment date"), the fourth payment due February 15th of the State fiscal year to which the billing relates, and the remaining two payments due on dates equidistant between the first and fourth payment dates. Nothing herein precludes making full payment before these dates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
55-3.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
